item.title: AMERITRON AL-811H Amplifier
item.dc:creator: Andrea Kizer
item.description: AMERITRON AL-811H Amplifier. Wired for 110V so keep in this in mind when you look at power output. Can easily wired interanally for 204VAC to provid full output. Ser#: 23440 Includes original box. Free UPS shipping CONUS! Used Item in Good Condition. Please note minor wear on side of face plate. Please see pictures. Item […]
item.content:encoded:
AMERITRON AL-811H Amplifier.

Wired for 110V so keep in this in mind when you look at power output. Can easily wired interanally for 204VAC to provid full output.

Ser#: 23440

Includes original box.

Free UPS shipping CONUS!

Used Item in Good Condition. Please note minor wear on side of face plate. Please see pictures.

Item tested and working. Please refer to photos.

 

Please note any test instruments and meters used to show functionality in photos are not included.

What you see in the photos that forms part of the accessories of the specific unit is included, nothing more.
